game - Variable in class src.GUI
 
Game - Class in src
A class that represents a game where the player needs to guess the shortest distance between two randomly selected nodes of a graph or between two nodes.
Game() - Constructor for class src.Game
Constructor used when the game selects random nodes.
Game(int, int) - Constructor for class src.Game
Constructor used when player specifies nodes.
GameInterface - Interface in src

Creates user interface for the player.

Gets adjacency matrix of the graph.

Gets the whole adjacency matrix, represented by a two-dimensional integer array.

getAllParents(int) - Method in class src.GraphADT
Gets all parents of all nodes within the graph using Breadth First Search.

Gets all possible shortest paths (same weight between the source and destination nodes and the same number of nodes).
